author: David Raleigh
title: Probe into whether bomb found near Russian-owned company was reaction to attacks on Ukraine
description: On Friday afternoon, a bomb was discovered attached to a fuel tank that services the Russian-owned Aughnish Alumina refinery sports and social club building.
content:
GARDAÍ ARE INVESTIGATING if a viable bomb, found near a Russian-owned alumina refinery located at Askeaton, Co Limerick on Friday was a direct reaction to Russias military invasion of Ukraine.
On la… [+3861 chars]
